array.string: Join a gym.
Start a fitness class, i.e. zumba.
Start swimming, or take swimming lessons.
Find a running buddy, go running.
Try muscle training.
Train for a triathlon, do a triathlon.
Join a slimming club to lose weight i.e. weight watchers.
Take dancing lessons, i.e. salsa.
Join a sports team i.e. netball.
Volounteer to coach a kids sports team i.e. football.
Dye your hair a bright colour.
Try out a new style, i.e. rocker.
Grow out your eyebrows.
Start deep conditioning, do it once a week.
Try out french pleats as a new hair style.
Get a really drastic hair cut.
Totally revamp your wardrobe.
Learn to walk in 6 inch heels.
Have a relaxing bath once a week, try bath bombs, salts and essential oils.
Take a makeup class.
Take up horse riding.
Learn to knit.
Learn how to play an instrument.
Join a new famndom, i.e. Marvel.
Take up skiing or snowboarding.
Volounteer at an animal shelter.
Create a blog.
Start up a youtube channel.
Take up arts and crafts as a stress reliever.
Design a product, try to sell it.
Afraid of heights? Do a bungee jump!
Afraid of dogs? Volounteer at a dog shelter.
Afraid of ghosts? Take your friends to a midnight ghost walk.
Afraid of public speaking? Present a power point on a chosen topic at an assembly.
Afraid of rejection? Ask someone out on a date.
Afraid of the ocean? Try open water swimming.
Afraid of fish? Go snorkeling in the Great Barrier Reef.
Afraid of people? Join a club and make new friends.
Afraid of roller coasters? Take a trip to Barcelona and go on the Shambhala, the tallest roller coaster in europe.
Afraid of spiders? Visit a wildlife centre and ask to hold a tarantula.
Create a new social media account, i.e. tumblr or twitter
Host a house party.
Camp out at a music festival with your friends.
Join another social circle.
Start going clubbing.
Reconnect with a drifted friend.
Tell someone you hate why you hate them.
Join a new club or committe.
Post a photo on social media every day.
Stop judging people and let them get on with their lives.
Clean out and re-organize your fridge.
Invent your own cocktail.
Start growing your own fruits and vegetables.
Replace white bread for half and half.
Cut down on the fizzy juice.
Cut down on the junk food.
Try and lose a few pounds by eating more protein.
Try veganism, try not to tell eveyone you know about it.
Try herbal tea, i.e. green tea.
Force yourself to like coffe.
Come up with a list of cities you want to visit, visit them throughout the year.
Go on a micro adventure - visit somewhere in your city you've never been before.
Travel somewhere out of your comfort zone.
Save up enough money to go to your dream destination.
Backpack across western Europe.
Visit America if you've never been.
Spend a few weeks in a developing country, volounteering with animals or people.
Visit Russia.
Learn to speak a new language and visit a country which speaks it.
Visit Iceland to see the Northern Lights.
Read one book every week.
Start reading articles on websites such as The Gurardian.
Expand your vocabulary with word of the day apps.
Do a brain puzzle every day to keep your mind active.
Learn 15 words of a new language every day.
Learn about a new historical character every week.
Complete one mathematical problem every day.
Create a doable study timetable, and stick to it.
Keep up to date with world affairs.
Start having friendly debates with your friends and family to improve your logical thinking.
